text: So our client bought a template that I believe is from v1 but the client portal is v2 and when we try to update the footer there is an "error" that won't let us update in v2. However, the error in the console is not clear at all...any way to find the issue? There is no hubl in any of the modules that we can see and we are not able to switch to v1 either...
I'd reach out to the template author. We just did that on a theme a client bought where some custom modules we're broken in DMv2 and they were nice enough to go in and fix them.
We’re getting the exact error on a template we’re building from scratch. Seems to be a bug. No matter what Typenof module we add. Causes an issue with any “global” groups
